mapper.select: select blog.id as blog_id, blog.title, blog.description, blog.content, user.id as user_id, user.username as user_username, user.avatar as user_avatar, blog.created_at, blog.updated_at from (select * from blog) blog inner join user on blog.user_id = user.id limit 1, 1

select blog.id as blog_id, blog.title, blog.description, blog.content, user.id as user_id, user.username, user.avatar , blog.created_at, blog.updated_at from (select * from blog where id =1) blog inner join user on blog.user_id = user.id
mapper.insert: insert into blog (title, description, content, user_id, created_at, updated_at) values (#{title}, #{description}, #{content}, #{userId}, now(), now())
